snippet: TU Dresden's headquarters are located at Helmholtzstraße Dresden Germany 10, Dresden, Saxony, 01069, Germany

title: TU Dresden - Wikipedia
snippet: The main campus, as well as the ... city of Dresden. The main campus is located south of the city center, mostly in the area bordered by Nöthnitzer Straße, Fritz-Förster-Platz and Münchner Platz; the medical faculty can be found in the Johannstadt district.

title: Contact — TU Dresden

title: Campus — TU Dresden — TU Dresden
snippet: The main campus of TUD Dresden University of Technology is located south Dresden's city centre and can be easily reached by bus (bus lines 61, 66, 85) and by tram (tram lines 3 and 8) or via the A17 highway (exit: “Dresden Südvorstadt”).

title: Locations — TU Dresden — TU Dresden
snippet: There are also other locations such as the Botanical Garden and university campuses in Tharandt, Pirna and Zittau. ... The main campus of TU Dresden is located south of the city centre and is easily accessible by bus and tram.
